#   FacebookBot crawls public web pages to help improve Facebook's
#   language models for speech recognition. The crawler follows
#   polite web crawling practices and respects robots.txt rules.
#   
#   You can identify FacebookBot traffic by its User-Agent string or
#   by its originating IP addresses.
#   
#   User-Agent string used by FacebookBot:
#       Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; FacebookBot/1.0; 
#       +https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sharing/webmasters/facebookbot/)
#   
#   To get the list of IP blocks used by FacebookBot, run:
#       whois -h whois.radb.net -- '-i origin AS32934' | grep ^route
